translations: n.（常指供观赏的）花（bloom 的复数）
v.开花；变得健康；繁荣；发亮，发光；给（透镜）敷膜；把（金属）轧成坯块（bloom 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 水发绿，水华；水藻大量繁殖；湖靛

sentences.sentence: She had missed the glorious blooms of the desert spring.
sentences.translation: 她错过了沙漠春天的繁花美景。

sentences.sentence: The sweet fragrance of the white blooms makes this climber a favourite.
sentences.translation: 白色花朵散发出的甜香使这株藤蔓成了宠儿。

sentences.sentence: The seeds then lie dormant until the next wet year, when the desert blooms again.
sentences.translation: 然后种子就会休眠，直到下一个潮湿的年份来临、沙漠再次开花的时候。
